display_long_description:
# Get ready to dive into ZAP

Whether you're flying solo or teaming up in co-op with a friend, ZAP offers **23** thrilling stages designed to push your aim, reflexes and situational awareness to their limits.

From competitive to laid-back levels, there’s something for everyone. Whether you're chasing the global leaderboard or simply soaking in the stunning visuals, we got you covered.

[media]

# No motion sickness
We designed this experience  to run always smoothly and with limited artificial movement. It's the game you should play with the friend that's new to VR.

# Zapper UI
The back of your gun tells you lots the vital information about your current situation. Your ammo, time left and the strikes. Tree strikes will fail a level. Strikes can be caused by failing to avoid projectiles, shooting protected targets etc.

# Secret bonuses
Every level has some hidden bonuses that can be unlocked for more points. If you found any they will be visible in your victory stats.

[media]

# 2 Player mode
We have all the good stuff you'd expect like voice chat, animated avatars and detailed stats to see who's excelling in what.
